H0.text: Pulex irritans is the Latin name for which insect. Louse

H1.text: Pulex irritans is the Latin name for which insect. Tick

H2.text: Pulex irritans is the Latin name for which insect. Bed Bug

H3.text: Pulex irritans is the Latin name for which insect. flea

A4.text: The human flea (Pulex irritans) – once also called the house flea – is a cosmopolitan flea species
